string.text: Heavy Pockets
Traders may offer you more rare and expensive goods.
Through trading, looting and stealing you have accumulated a small fortune. Your wealth is well known and many traders will favour your custom.
You have attained the Heavy Pockets achievement.
Radiotherapy
You have a chance of surviving an emission without anabiotics, but there is no guarantee.
Strangely, you no longer feel haunted by the groans of an emission. You believe there to be a chance they may be more forgiving to you.
You have attained the Radiotherapy achievement.
Infopreneur
Traders will now pay you a small additional bonus for each PDA delivered to them.
Whether selling or buying, to many people information is just as valuable as artefacts. Word has spread that you are a reliable source of such a commodity.
You have attained the Infopreneur achievement.
Duga Free
Paths through Yantar and Radar are now accessible to the dismay of Monolith everywhere.

After seeing what reckless experimentation has brought to the Zone you have taken action into your own hands. Paths through Yantar and Radar are now open since disabling the Miracle Machine and Brain Scorcher.
You have attained the Duga Free achievement.
Well Dressed
You have become proficient at hunting the mutants of the Zone. From now on there is a small chance of field dressing extra resources.
Rightly so does the Zone's wildlife fear you - as to much of it you were the last thing it saw. Lately, you notice your bloody harvest become exceptionally bountiful.
You have attained the Well Dressed achievement.
Trigger Happy
You have attained the Trigger Happy achievement.
